Title: "Extracting Named Entities and Contacts from Text Documents"
Text:
C:\Users\adamh\Downloads\azure-search.pdf5,      "inputs": [         {             "name": "text",              "source": "/document/content"         },         {             "name": "languageCode",              "source": "/document/language" JSONJSON        }     ],     "outputs": [         {             "name": "persons",              "targetName": "people"         },         {             "name":
"emails",              "targetName": "emails"         },         {             "name": "namedEntities",              "targetName": "namedEntities"         }     ]   } Sample input{     "values": [       {         "recordId": "1",         "data":            {              "text": "Contoso Corporation was founded by Jean Martin.
They can be reached at contact@contoso.com",              "languageCode": "en"            }       }     ] } Sample output{   "values": [     {       "recordId": "1",       "data" :        {         "people": [ "Jean Martin"],         "emails":["contact@contoso.
com"],         "namedEntities":  The offsets returned for entities in the output of this skill are directly returned from theLanguage Service APIs, which means if you are using them to index into the originalstring, you should use the StringInfo class in .NET in order to extract the correct content.For more information, see Multilingual and emoji support in Language service features.
If the language code for the document is unsupported, a warning is returned and noentities are extracted.Built-in skillsHow to define a skillset        [           {             "category": "Person",             "subcategory": null,             "length": 11,             "offset": 35,             "confidenceScore": 0. 98,             "text": "Jean Martin"           },           {             "category": "Email",             "subcategory": null,             "length": 19,             "offset": 71,             "confidenceScore": 0.8,             "text": "contact@contoso.com"           }         ],       }     }   ] } Warning casesSee alsoImage Analysis cognitive skillArticle•07/18/2023The Image Analysis skill extracts a rich set of visual features based on the imagecontent. For example, you can generate a caption from an image, generate tags, oridentify celebrities and landmarks.
